comment: Here is the News . Iranian Crisis ( Make sure you ask about unlawful killing ) . Labour Leadership ( Don t ask any candidates about ) . Australia Bush Fires ( Don t forget to mention ) . Er , that s it <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Here is the News . Iranian Crisis ( Make sure you ask about unlawful killing ) . Labour Leadership ( Don t ask any candidates about ) . Australia Bush Fires ( Don t forget to mention ) . Er , that s it <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / news
            :location (h / here))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c / crisis
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Iran")))
            :op2 (e / ensure-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (a2 / ask-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                              :mod (l / law
                                    :polarity -))))
            :op3 (l2 / lead-02
                  :ARG0 (p / political-party
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Labour")))
            :op4 (a3 / ask-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a4 / about)
                  :ARG2 (c3 / candidate
                        :mod (a5 / any)))
            :op5 (f / fire-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Australia"
                              :op2 "Bush")))
            :op6 (f2 / forget-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (m2 / mention-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 f))
            :op7 (e2 / er
                  :mode expressive)))
